t: Pepsi to launch naturally sweetened soda on Amazon, bypassing stores | Reuters
s: October 1, 2014 - NEW YORK, Oct 1 (Reuters) - PepsiCo Inc for the first time is introducing a product exclusively through Amazon.com Inc as the snack and soft drink maker aims to expand its footprint in e-commerce. The product, a naturally sweetened soda called Pepsi True, will be available on Amazon in mid-October ...

s: March 18, 2025 - PepsiCo just announced it is acquiring prebiotic soda brand Poppi for $1.95 billion, a major accomplishment for a brand founded less than ten years ago.
